Reviews.Title: “Best for value! Best for convenience! Best for service!”
Reviews.Author: XTravlr
Reviews.Content: We are getting ready for our 3rd and final trip for the summer and have found Classic Motor to be great. Katie has been very accomodating. People think convenient is on the strip but for shoppers and dining travlers like us we find that to avoid the strip Shepherd of the Hills Expressway is the only way to go. Here's why; easy back entrance to Tanger, easy access to the Landing, easy access out to the Branson Hills pkwy where Target, TJ maxx, Best Buy, Bed Bath and Beyond and many more stores are located, plus the IMax is located just up the street and easy to get to Silver Dollar City as well. Classic Motor gives us a discount for being teachers as well so ask they might help you out!

Reviews.Title: “Cheap but good”
Reviews.Author: tlcmomof7
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights at this hotel. The breakfast was a normal hotel continental plus breakfast. IT was a much bigger room than most, but decorated a bit out dated. The room was clean but the beds were a bit firm and I like a firm bed. The sheets were clean but almost see through. I could have used an extra blanket. The a/c was the kind that cycles on and off, which kept waking me up. Our room was near the street which was a bit noisy early in the morning. I truly have no complaints and feel that we got what we paid for. We spent very little time in the room as we didn't come to sit, but to see the sites, so except for sleeping we were hardly ever there. There was a little trouble with parking because we were out later than everyone else so we had to park quite a ways from our room, but we are healthy and can walk, so not truly a problem. I would stay there again, if the price were the same.

Reviews.Title: “They held our credit card hostage!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Hudspet
Reviews.Content: Before you say well duh every hotel does it too here is what happened. We checked in and a hold was placed on our bank card the lady at the counter over charged us because we had a gift certificate the next morning when changing rooms (our fault we wanted a bottom floor room) they "fixed" the problem placing a second hold on our card so now we sit in our room watching tv insead of enjoying Branson because most of our money is on our bank card their responce was oh well it will be cleared up in a few weeks at the most by your bank.

Reviews.Title: “Family vacation”
Reviews.Author: Senior5510
Reviews.Content: Great value! Rooms were large, extra clean, and beds very comfortable. If you are looking for just the basics at a very reasonable price - this is the place. Staff were all very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was your normal hotel breakfast (might be better if offered low fat milk instead of the whole). Just a couple of minor things that need attention: TV remotes need to be updated so that the sleep timer and channel buttons work properly, and the sink faucet was really hard to turn off and on. Other than these minor things - great place to stay and would certainly stay again. I would definitely highly recommend the Classic Motor Inn - thanks for a great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Lookingglass Weekend 6-7-12/06-10-12”
Reviews.Author: crosfiremom
Reviews.Content: This was my first trip with the Look Glass Corvete Club, and I can say it was the best. The accommodations were great and the staff at the motel were great. They way the just sort of let the club take over the parking lot in the evenings was wonderful. I don't think the club ever "wanted" for anything...if we needed something, all we had to do was aks, and it was done. Buddy was fun to watch and get to know, also. You can guarantee, that my future trips to Branson, I will stay at the Classic, and will recommend it to all of my friends. Thanks for making ny first "trip" with the club a memorable and enjoyable one Debbie Pritchett & George Bunker

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff; very good location”
Reviews.Author: seeker1866
Reviews.Content: Front desk staff were professional and friendly. Location of motel was very good since it is not on the main drag (76), very light traffic so easy to get in and out of the parking lot; not a lot of road noise either. We stayed two nights, had the breakfast both days and the evening snack the second evening. Plenty of hot water for bath or showers. No flat screen TV but great selection of channels and a decent picture. The breakfast area is very large compared to most motels. Very easy to get to the main drag and to silver dollar city. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, good location and affordable!!”
Reviews.Author: gah2323
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very very clean, and everyone was very very helpful!! When asked where to find something, they did not hesitate to help you find what you were looking for AND show you how to get there, they even suggested other attractions that we might like as well!! They have not only continental breakfast but they also have evening snacks!! I stayed there this past weekend to go see a couple of shows!!! Had a wonderful time and would definately consider staying there again. My only down side to this was the beds were not a comfortable as I would have liked!! But for over all, I can see myself and my family staying here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “clean, comfortable and affordable”
Reviews.Author: nuwife
Reviews.Content: This motel is very clean and basic and affordable. They have a free breakfast and provide evening snacks such as choc. chip cookies and popcorn. We stayed there for two nights, as part of an entertainment package, before we went to a time share and we were pleasantly surprised. The owners were extremely friendly and the cleaning staff was great too. I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Clean! Clean! Clean!”
Reviews.Author: Jackie S
Reviews.Content: This was the cleanest hotel that we have stayed in for quite a few years. It had everything we needed and the service was so friendly. For the money, it can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel and staff”
Reviews.Author: ScubaDiverRick
Reviews.Content: The hotel is convenienltly located. The rooms were spacious and the showers had plenty of hot water, and the heaters kicked out a lot of heat. Breakfasts were more than I expected. We had the choice of biscuits and gravy, yogurt, hot/cold cereal, toast, fruit cup, donuts, orange/apple juice, milk, and coffee. There is a computer in the lobby for those who do not have thier own personal computers along during their vacation. Snacks were offered in the lobby in the evening -- popcorn, cookies and coffee. The staff was both responsive and very courteous. On the day our bus departed, breakfast began 30 minutes earlier than normal in order to accomodate our schedule. My local freinds reinforced my perception of the hotel by saying that they too had heard good things about the motel.

Reviews.Title: “Classic Motor Inn”
Reviews.Author: Camie R
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean and easy to access from anywhere in Branson. The staff was very kind and courteous.The rooms were spacious however the beds were a little firm. The hotel offers a free breakfast. The hotel is located just minutes from both the Tanger Mall and the Red Roof Mall. The City of Branson Trail of Lights is located less than 5 minutes from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for the money”
Reviews.Author: Coachlite
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean and good sized. Two of us shared a double queen. There was a refrigerator in the room as well. You have to ask for your coffee maker at the front desk when you check in. You have to pick up your coffee from the front desk every day, the maid service does not do this. I believe the bathroom facilities were made for short people. The sink/vanity is very low. The shower is the same. However, you are not wanting for hot water or pressure it is excellent. The continental breakfast left a lot to be desired so we chose to eat out.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly--Great late night snacks.”
Reviews.Author: Barberry3341
Reviews.Content: Where can you go after a late show and get something to eat? How about your motel lobby? It was so nice to be able to get some snacks including ho tcookies, popcorn, doughnuts and tea or coffee or lemonade. Also it gave you a chance to talk to others returning from shows. They are working on upgrading the beds which was our biggest concern. The staff was very friendly and responded to any request immediately. Breakfast is really good including bisquits and gravey, french toast, muffins, rolls, juice, coffee, etc. The room is large with pleanty of room for everyone. The fresh doughnuts were awsome--stay there for them.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Service and Location!”
Reviews.Author: djoyce05
Reviews.Content: Just checked out from Classic Motor Inn. Great room for a great price. Rooms were clean and the beds were comfy. The location is down from the busy section of Shepard of the Hills and it is very accessible. I would recommend them to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for the Price”
Reviews.Author: happynJesus
Reviews.Content: While it isn't the Ritz, for a family on a budget the Classic Motor Inn is just the place to stay. The rooms were clean, pool was nice, and breakfast was included. We stayed 2 nights during the busy season and all total it was under $100, tax included! The staff there was also very friendly and helpful. When in Branson with the kids, this is where we'll stay!

Reviews.Title: “Always Happy To Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: Alicia D
Reviews.Content: I LOVE staying at the Classic Motor Inn in Branson! I have stayed here several times for various events and just for fun. The hotel offers a pool, laundry services, free internet, and evening snacks. The rooms are always clean. Even on nights when the hotel is full, it is very quiet. The hotel's location is very convenient to shopping, amusement parks, and event locations like the Tri-Lakes Event Center. It is also located near great shows like Titanic and Noah's Ark. If you are hungry, no problem!! Great food places like Red Lobster, Olive Garden, & Ruby Tuesday's are very near as well as local restaurants with a great variety of satisfying tastes. Want fast food... Taco Bell and McDonald's are not too far away either. The staff is super nice and the continental breakfast has a lot to offer. There are also several local breakfast areas nearby. We love the Classic Motor Inn, I always stay here and look forward to staying again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful in every way”
Reviews.Author: Willis B
Reviews.Content: We always enjoy staying at the Classic Motor Inn, Branson, MO. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The room are clean, breakfast is great and plentiful. The kids love the pool. It too is always clean and inviting. And of course we all enjoy the evening snacks. Thanks for helping to make this an enjoyable and hassle free vacation spot.

Reviews.Title: “Our favorite place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: estith
Reviews.Content: The Classic Motor Inn is easy to find; clean; and has friendly, helpful staff and owners. They are reasonably priced and have an excellent, extensive continental breakfast included. It is our favorite place to stay in Branson. Steve Stith

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: kathyturnerbelle
Reviews.Content: we love this motel. the rooms are clean.nice breakfast and breakfast room. nice clean pool. loved the pool towells being available at the pool.conveinntly located. we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Warm friendly experience”
Reviews.Author: aroha66
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay, the staff from the time we arrived to the time left were friendly and very accomadating..the room was very clean...we enjoyed the pool after spending a day out in Branson and then when we got out of the pool we loved the free snacks provided....we will be staying again Kathleen Mills

Reviews.Title: “Perfect service, great location. Will Return”
Reviews.Author: liverp00l3
Reviews.Content: We had never been to "Classic Motor Inn" previously. We have traveled to many areas for vacations for hotel service. This hotel truely treats each guest as a guest and went out of their way to may our stay extrordianary. Rooms were very clean. Every need met. Snack night was thoughtful for the guests and complementary breakfast had a wide variety. The pool was clean and had towel available there. In this world of business I can say that the staff had the old fashioned values of service. The staff went out of their way to orient us to locations of shows etc. Our tickets were even waiting when we arrive for our show. The lobby had antique car for viewing. The guys loved that. WE WILL BE BACK!!!!! WE ALSO LOVED THE LOCATION, QUIET, NOT HEAVEY TRAFFICE BUT CONVIENIENT TO THE SHOWS AND ATTRACTIONS. We thank 'Classic Motor Inn" for a pleasurable stay. The Suttons.

Reviews.Title: “Immaculate!”
Reviews.Author: jknelsonco
Reviews.Content: Our vacation in Branson coincided with the horrible, fluke storm system in MO so we spent a lot more time in our motel room than we had planned to. We were so grateful that we had chosen Classic Motor Inn because the room was very clean, spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was way above average and the snacks each night were a nice bonus. The staff was friendly and helpful. Overall, this was motel an incredible value and we will definitely stay there on future trips to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Value for your money!”
Reviews.Author: dlb163
Reviews.Content: We will stay here again. Convenient to all routes our room included micro & fridge. Clean and affordable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Property! Great People!”
Reviews.Author: kadidaniels
Reviews.Content: I recently visited Branson and stayed at Classic Motor Inn. The hotel exceeded my expectations. The rooms were clean and also spacious! The rooms all have a refrigerator, and we requested a microwave and one was brought immediately to our room. The breakfast was awesome -- biscuits & gravy, yogurt, fruit, cereal, juice, donuts, and more! The staff was police and courteous and made me feel welcome! I would gladly recommend Classic Motor Inn to anyone traveling to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “We felt like we were home ,very friendly people”
Reviews.Author: mglavoie
Reviews.Content: This place was ammasing,excellent staff,sparkling rooms,good continantal breakfast & night snacks.The motel is also well situated it 's near shopping malls,restaurants,theaters,and a lot more.I would recomend this place to all my friends and all people who like a quiet place to stay and at a reasonable price. Anne-Marie & Ghislain Lavoie Grand Falls N.B. Canada

Reviews.Title: “Great atmosphere, excellent service, family oriented, would stay their again”
Reviews.Author: memy3sons
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a great location, it's not far from the theaters and the stores. The staff was inviting, freindly and helpful. The atmosphere when you enter the lobby is cozy and as alot of warmth, very nice sitting area and fire place. The room was very nice, clean and cozy also. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel to everyone, you want regret staying at the Classic Motor Inn. If your a fan of old cars you'll enjoy the cars in the lobby. The owners are very friendly, helpful and ready to answer any questions.

Reviews.Title: “It was quit and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: Cjm0413
Reviews.Content: I will stay there again the next time we are in Branson. The staff was very friendly and we felt at home. The rooms were very nice and acomedated my needs.

Reviews.Title: “Value does not equal good”
Reviews.Author: Rai051
Reviews.Content: Roaches in room. Hard bed mattresses, no mattress covers on bed and no blankets. Staff at desk was impatient and indifferent. Meanwhile you could hear someone in office behind the staff selling insurance. Too many other hotels to stay at. Cannot recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: dogs22
Reviews.Content: The Classic Motor Inn was a great place to stay. The owners are so nice and welcoming. The continental breakfast was great. They had many different things to choose from. The popcorn and cookies they had at night were a nice end to our fun filled days. The lobby is a fun place to sit around and chat with others. The rooms were very nice and roomy. I really felt at home during our stay. I would definitely recommend The Classic Motor Inn to others. It was wonderful!!

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: chimigirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 days with our 6 & 8 year old. They loved the hotel. They have the basics for breakfast (cereal, bagels, etc). The owners are very nice and so was the lady who cleaned our room. They provided extra towels and pillows upon request. It is a nice location away from the busy strip and very close to all of the back routes through branson which made it easy to get from the strip back to the hotel without having to sit in traffic.

Reviews.Title: “Loved It!!!”
Reviews.Author: Meg212
Reviews.Content: This hotel was overall really great! The staff was very friendly. We were not even bothered so early in the morning by housekeeping so we were able to sleep in. We will be returning in the future, most Definitely! We also recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: kisskid
Reviews.Content: On our recent trip to Branson we had selected the economy package for our stay. We're not in the hotel much. Mostly out at the shows or shopping. We were pleasantly surprised by the nice accomodations at the Classic Motor Inn. The room was very clean and the beds comfortable. Everything worked fine. The breakfast was the usual fare of doughnuts, cereal, muffins etc. We paid $49.95 a night and have paid alot more for alot less. We'll stay here again next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Part of the family”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It's clean, they are very friendly and the rooms are just right. We have stayed there for the last 10 years and never had a bad stay. It's family owned and operated and they hustle for you. Contential breakfast, and you might see one of the entertainers come in set down with you and shoot the breeze. It's off of the main drag so traffic is not a problem getting in and out. Located where you have a varity of roads to take to get to your destination the back way and miss a lot of traffic. If you go be sure and pet Abby for me. (their dog)

Reviews.Title: “Part of the family....”
Reviews.Author: carterwife
Reviews.Content: It was my first trip to Classic Motor Inn, and I will not stay at any other hotel in Branson. The family atmosphere was AWESOME. The room was immaculate. The staff welcomed me into their family, and I felt comfortable and relaxed my entire stay. Service and advice for avoiding traffic in Branson was the best. I don't know anyone would stay anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, convenient”
Reviews.Author: mbstone
Reviews.Content: Motel with exterior corridors, clean rooms. Outdoor pool (open at time of our stay in mid-Oct). Features display of classic cars (restored by owner). Continental breakfast. Convenient to restaurants, showrooms. Could use peepholes/door chains.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: robynwins
Reviews.Content: This is where we almost always stay in Branson for the last few years now. It's off the strip so not as much traffic. Easy to get to the alternate routes around town and get to your destination quickly from the hotel. The rooms are always nice and clean, staff is always very friendly. There is a well kept pool in the back of the hotel. They have ajoining rooms available. A free breakfast is included which is nothing fancy, but hey it's free. They have cold cereal, muffins, bagels, juice, coffee, etc. For classic car lovers, this is the place to stay. They always have a couple cars on display. Lots of car merchandise in the lobby also.

HotelInfo.Name: Classic Motor Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2384 Shepherd of the Hills Expressway, Branson, MO 65616
